title: Google app or assistant doesn't send me push notifications
content:
Google app or assistant doesn't send my any push notifications. 
I can see all that information in my feed - weather updates, regular routes, my reservations, sport scores. But I don't recieve them as push notifications. All the settings are ON. 
If I log in with another google account, I begin to recieve all those notifications immediately. So there's an issue with my main account settings.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
